title: Julian Nagelsmann SACKED by Bayern Munich with Thomas Tuchel lined up as successor| All Football
snippet: Julian Nagelsmann has been sacked by Bayern Munich - with former Chelsea boss Thomas Tuchel lined up to replace him.

title: Bayern Munich name RB Leipzig's Julian Nagelsmann as Hansi Flick's successor | Bundesliga
snippet: RB Leipzig's Julian Nagelsmann (l.) will succeed Hansi Flick (r.) as Bayern Munich head coach.

title: Bayern Munich sack coach Julian Nagelsmann
snippet: Bayern Munich say they will part ways with coach Julian Nagelsmann and appoint Thomas Tuchel as his replacement. The sacking comes as the perennial league winners struggle to assert themselves in the Bundesliga title race.

title: Julian Nagelsmann sacked as Bayern Munich head coach with Thomas Tuchel appointed | Football News | Sky Sports
snippet: Julian Nagelsmann has been sacked by Bayern Munich, with Thomas Tuchel confirmed as his successor.

title: Julian Nagelsmann - Wikipedia
snippet: On 27 April 2021, Bayern Munich appointed Nagelsmann as head coach on a five-year deal, effective from 1 July 2021, replacing Hansi Flick for a world record managerial transfer fee of â‚¬25 million.
